name: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
description:
In the midst of a well-deserved retirement, Abe was visited by a vision of Mudokon spirit guides. He learned that the Mugogs were preparing to dig Necrum, the city of the dead Mudokons, to harvest bones and make a super-breathtaking mixture: Soul-Storm.

After releasing the Mudokon spirits imprisoned in Mudanchee and Mudomo, Abe received terrible powers including healing the Mudokons of the Soul-Storm addiction and becoming invisible. After many adventures Abe finally managed to enter the SoulStorm brewery ...

Abe learned the secret of the SoulStorm before blowing up the building and joining his friends who were cured of addiction.
